item.title: Gūlistān, taṣnīf-i Ḥaz̤rat Shaykh Saʻdī Shīrāzī.
notes: Paper: thick cream color Indian paper; no borders; black ink with rubrication; catchwords on rectos.
Nastaʻliq; 13 lines in written area 17.5 x 7 cm.
Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M80.
Previous owner's name on flyleaf: Robt. Atkinson, Scholar, 14 Trinity College.
Nineteenth century half-leather binding in brown leather with tan marbled boards.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
medium: 169 leaves (13 lines), paper : bound ; 23 x 13 cm
other_title: گولستان، تصنيف حضرت شيخ سعدي شيريزي.

subject: manuscripts, persian
india
washington (d.c.)
title: Gūlistān, taṣnīf-i Ḥaz̤rat Shaykh Saʻdī Shīrāzī.
description: Manuscript. Persian. Title from colophon. Name of scribe not indicated. Probably written in India. Paper: thick cream color Indian paper; no borders; black ink with rubrication; catchwords on rectos. Nastaʻliq; 13 lines in written area 17.5 x 7 cm. Folios 1b-169a. Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M80. Previous owner's name on flyleaf: Robt. Atkinson, Scholar, 14 Trinity College. Nineteenth century half-leather binding in brown leather with tan marbled boards. Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
other_title: گولستان، تصنيف حضرت شيخ سعدي شيريزي.
